title: GET_HELI_REAR_ROTOR_HEALTH
content:
0x33EE6E2B// GetHeliRearRotorHealth
float GET_HELI_REAR_ROTOR_HEALTH(Vehicle vehicle);Parameters:vehicle: The target vehicle.Returns: Returns the health of the helicopter's rear rotor. The maximum health value is 1000.This native is a getter for SET_HELI_TAIL_ROTOR_HEALTH
codeBlocks:
local ped = PlayerPedId()
local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(ped, false)
-- Example usage for GET_HELI_REAR_ROTOR_HEALTH
GetHeliRearRotorHealth(vehicle)
